sentences.en: A joint of the vertical pile with power - wasting gap is brought forward based on tenon - and - mortise work.
sentences.cn: 根据榫卯连接减震耗能的原理提出一种具有耗能缝隙的直桩节点.

sentences.en: Methods Human Tenon � � s capsule fibroblasts were cultured in vitro.
sentences.cn: 方法体外培养人眼球筋膜囊成纤维细胞.

sentences.en: Mortise and tenon structure can withstand a nail than furniture made of greater tension.
sentences.cn: 卯榫结构可以承受比用钉子做成的家具更大的张力.

sentences.en: The tenon does not conform to the mortise , so it can not fit into the mortise.
sentences.cn: 榫头的大小和卯眼不相符, 无法落槽.

sentences.en: There are two sorts of tenon sleeve : 925 silver or Ni alloy.
sentences.cn: 音色独特,插口有两种选择: 镍合金管或者925银管,避免氧化.

trans.tran_en: an end of a piece of wood, that has been cut to fit exactly into a  mortise  in order to form a strong joint
to form a tenon on (a piece of wood)
